hi all, first i didn't dl this file but reading the troubles peeps getting i would like  2 comment..

i use ultraiso. if i want 2 install on a machine that has no dvd like a mini laptop or such i use ultra  iso 2 extract the iso too a flash disk, make sure it is big enough for the windows u are installing and check if it is formatted correctly for your machine.. that means some bios do not take ntfs format so 2 be on the ssafe side for older machines use fat. for burning a file like this i use nero and set the burn speed at minimum. any other iso program with build in burn option can handle this task, like i mentioned i use ultra iso and it uses nero 2 burn so i prefer 2 just use nero directly so i can set the brun speed manually.
a minimum burn speed will make the dvd more reliable. I got nero 10 from a amazing torrent site called "The Pirate Bay" same for ultra iso. btw ultra iso also replaced my deamon warez cuz of it's virtual drive option, any other iso like a game or microsoft Office 2010.iso can be directly mounted and installed, you can also adjust iso files or make a rip from an existing dvd or such..
hope it works out for all.

hey Computer-User, thanks for this! I have few questions>
I have already a Vista home premiume installed on my laptop. 
1.Can I repaire/overwrite my current OS using this torrent?
2.If yes, then > Is there any chance to loss my data of my HD?
3.What about my currently installed programs?
4.What files i have to burn after downloading this torrent?

thanks,
waiting for your answers

"autodriver2010"

You Only Need Too Burn 1 File, That Is The .ISO File :)

You Can Burn The Activation Program & The "Keys" .Txt Document Onto A Separate CD :)

But Keep The Activation Program & The "Keys" Document In The SAME Folder Or Activation Will Not Work.

The Type Of Windows Installation You're Wanting Too Do Is A Upgrade Type Installation.

After The DVD Is Burned, You Will Need To Start The Installation From The Desktop Not By Restarting Your Computer.

Click On Your "Start Menu", And Click On "My Computer" Right Click On The DVD & Click On Open.

You Will Need To Start The Installation From There, And After Windows Installation Is Complete....

All Of Your Old Files Will Be In A Folder Named "Old Windows Files"

You Will Find All Of Your Old Files Inside Your Main Hard Drive In That Folder :) :)

Hi guys i just installed this and it works 100% ! 
what i did:
1. downloaded driver solution(transfer it to a usb flash driver)
2. mounted it in deamon tools (i had windows 7)
3. ran a normal setup for os. ( you will get the windows.old, but thats for backup but just delete it later)
4. then i just ran the dirver pack solution and everything works ! thanx dude !!

hi guys! This worsk perfect so tell you how to install this easy
step 1: download driver pack solution and place it on a usb flash drive.
step 2: download deamon tools
step 3 : mount this file in deamon tools
step 4: just run the instalation, but it dosent work to upgrade. but that is kinda good because you get the windows.old folder at your programfiles. if something goes wrong you just start the rollback
step 5: run the driver solution and then you get wireless network and everything ! 

so guys enjoy ! (Y)
